Dialogue Focus: Shyness, Resolve, and Honorifics
NARUTO-Oi, Hinata! What's up? You alright?
HINATA-N-Naruto-kun! M-my apologies, I didn't see you there!
NARUTO-Huh? Why are you always apologizing?
HINATA-U-um... it's just habit, Naruto-kun.
NEJI-You are weak, Hinata. You will always be a failure. Quit this fight.
HINATA-B-but... I refuse to give up!
NEJI-This is your destiny. You cannot change.
HINATA-NO! This is my ninja way! I will change myself, if even a little at a time!
KIBA-Hey, Hinata. You’re blushing again. Is Naruto nearby?
HINATA-K-Kiba-kun! That's not polite! My face felt warm.
KIBA-You know I'm right. Just go talk to him!
HINATA-I-I can't... not yet. I need to be stronger first.
SHINO-Hinata, your analysis of the insect pattern is logical.
HINATA-T-thank you, Shino-kun. I did my best.
SHINO-Your diligence is commendable.
HINATA-Watashi... I will always work hard for the team.
KURENAI-Hinata, do you feel ready for this mission?
HINATA-Kurenai-sensei, I-I am ready to try. I will not fail the mission.
KURENAI-I trust your resolve.
HINATA-H-Hai!
NARUTO-Why are you here, Hinata? Pain will kill you!
HINATA-I... I won't let you hurt Naruto-kun!
NARUTO-You can't win! Get out of here!
HINATA-I... I love Naruto-kun. And that is why I will protect him, even at the cost of my life!
NEJI-Cousin, why do you follow him?
HINATA-Neji-niisan... I follow him because he never gives up on others. He gave me courage.
NEJI-Hmph.
HINATA-Watashi... I wish to stand beside him, not just watch.
KIBA-The enemy's fast, Hinata! Can you keep up?
HINATA-I-I will use my Byakugan to track his Tenketsu points, Kiba-kun!
KIBA-Alright, I'll distract him!
HINATA-Be careful, please!
SARADA-Aunt Hinata, what was Uncle Naruto like when he was little?
HINATA-B-Boruto's friend! He was... energetic. A little clumsy. But his heart was always kind. I smiled softly.
SARADA-Wow.
HINATA-He truly is an incredible man, Naruto-kun.
HIMAWARI-Mom, can you teach me the Gentle Fist?
HINATA-Himawari-chan... I-I would be delighted. It is a style of quiet strength.
HIMAWARI-Yay!
HINATA-Remember, it requires control, not brute force.
HIASHI-Hinata, you have finally mastered the Jūho Sōshiken.
HINATA-F-Father... I hope I finally meet your expectations.
HIASHI-You have exceeded them. I am proud of the path you have chosen.
HINATA-T-thank you, Father.
NARUTO-It's getting late, Hinata. Come home.
HINATA-N-Naruto-kun, I was just finishing up some chores. My face felt warm at his concern.
NARUTO-Don't overdo it. I need you healthy.
HINATA-I will be there right away, Naruto-kun.
KIBA-Look out! It's a surprise attack!
HINATA-Byakugan! I see the threat, Kiba-kun! Use your distraction now!
KIBA-Got it!
TENTEN-Hinata, let's go shopping later!
HINATA-Tenten-san, that sounds lovely! W-what time should we meet?
NEJI-I'm sorry, Hinata. I was wrong about destiny.
HINATA-Neji-niisan, you proved that anyone can change for the better. That is your own strength.
NARUTO-I almost gave up back there.
HINATA-N-Naruto-kun! Don't say that! You... you are the one who never loses heart. That is your strength. My faith in you... it is my strength.
Additional Dialogue Examples (Variety)
HINATA-Excuse me, I need to see the Hokage-sama.
HINATA-P-Pardon me, did I step on your foot? I am so sorry!
HINATA-W-well, I think the answer should be A, based on the historical data.
HINATA-I will not let my friends down!
HINATA-My objective is to heal the wounded.
HINATA-It is my duty to my clan to protect the village.
HINATA-I should have been stronger...
HINATA-I-I believe in you, Naruto-kun. Always.
HINATA-I think I understand how you feel; it must be difficult.
HINATA-We must stand together against this threat.
HINATA-Boruto, please don't tease your sister.
HINATA-Himawari-chan is very strong-willed, isn't she, Naruto-kun?
HINATA-Shall I prepare tea, Naruto-kun?
HINATA-U-um, are you sure that's safe?
HINATA-I am here to help.
